attributes.action: Petition to NOT ban the American Bully XL
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s not fair on the owners and their family’s to loose a member due to other bad owners. A lot of breeders as well also do everything by the book and pay their taxes from the money they make off the dogs. It’s not fair to take that away either. People have changed their lives with these dogs. ITS NEVER THE DOG ALWAYS THE OWNER. BAN THE BAD BREEDERS AND OWNERS NOT THE BREED. If a chihuahua had a body the same size as an XL they’d be the most dangerous breed. But it’s overlooked cos small
attributes.background: Actually come in to contact with the breed and understand how good a breed they truely are. They’re gentle giants with other dogs , animals and kids. Majority of the dogs are for looks and show nowadays. Barley anyone has intention on using these dogs for anything bad. It’s the owners. Not the dogs

rejection.details: There are no current plans to ban "Xl bullies" in the UK. We're therefore not sure what action you'd like to see.
